tidbits.title: Nile River
tidbits.description: Sudan is home to significant portions of the Nile River, including the meeting point of the Blue Nile and White Nile in Khartoum, a historically important city.

tidbits.title: Diverse Cultures
tidbits.description: The country boasts a diverse cultural landscape with various ethnic groups, each contributing to Sudan's cultural richness through language, traditions, and customs.

tidbits.title: Archaeological Sites
tidbits.description: Sudan has numerous archaeological sites like the ancient city of MeroÃ«, known for its pyramids, providing insights into ancient Nubian civilizations.
